name: Sea of Treasures
description:
History

There's a story about a legendary treasure hidden on an unknown island. This treasure is so grand that it can turn a simple pirate into the king of pirates. However, the map leading to the island was divided into four parts, and their locations remain unknown.

When all four parts of the map are gathered, the group will set sail towards the treasure island
